alert.note: Alert for Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 12:45AM CDT until September 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WHEELER...COLLINGSWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 1244 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Twitty to 9 miles east of Memphis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Shamrock, Wheeler, Dodson, Lutie, Twitty, Dozier, Lela, Quail, and Samnorwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
